metadata.title: CVE-2015-20107 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
In Python (aka CPython) up to 3.10.8, the mailcap module does not addescape characters into commands discovered in the system mailcap file. Thismay allow attackers to inject shell commands into applications that callmailcap.findmatch with untrusted input (if they lack validation ofuser-provided filenames or arguments). The fix is also back-ported to 3.7,3.8, 3.9

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-20107` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

idle-python2.7 - 2.7.18-1~20.04.3
libpython2.7 - 2.7.18-1~20.04.3
libpython2.7-minimal - 2.7.18-1~20.04.3
libpython2.7-stdlib - 2.7.18-1~20.04.3
libpython2.7-testsuite - 2.7.18-1~20.04.3
python2.7 - 2.7.18-1~20.04.3
python2.7-examples - 2.7.18-1~20.04.3
python2.7-minimal - 2.7.18-1~20.04.3
No subscription required

idle-python3.8 - 3.8.10-0ubuntu1~20.04.5
libpython3.8 - 3.8.10-0ubuntu1~20.04.5
libpython3.8-minimal - 3.8.10-0ubuntu1~20.04.5
libpython3.8-stdlib - 3.8.10-0ubuntu1~20.04.5
libpython3.8-testsuite - 3.8.10-0ubuntu1~20.04.5
python3.8 - 3.8.10-0ubuntu1~20.04.5
python3.8-examples - 3.8.10-0ubuntu1~20.04.5
python3.8-full - 3.8.10-0ubuntu1~20.04.5
python3.8-minimal - 3.8.10-0ubuntu1~20.04.5
python3.8-venv - 3.8.10-0ubuntu1~20.04.5
No subscription required

idle-python3.9 - 3.9.5-3ubuntu0~20.04.1+esm1
libpython3.9 - 3.9.5-3ubuntu0~20.04.1+esm1
libpython3.9-minimal - 3.9.5-3ubuntu0~20.04.1+esm1
libpython3.9-stdlib - 3.9.5-3ubuntu0~20.04.1+esm1
libpython3.9-testsuite - 3.9.5-3ubuntu0~20.04.1+esm1
python3.9 - 3.9.5-3ubuntu0~20.04.1+esm1
python3.9-examples - 3.9.5-3ubuntu0~20.04.1+esm1
python3.9-full - 3.9.5-3ubuntu0~20.04.1+esm1
python3.9-minimal - 3.9.5-3ubuntu0~20.04.1+esm1
python3.9-venv - 3.9.5-3ubuntu0~20.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: python2.7 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.18-1~20.04.3').
python3.8 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.8.10-0ubuntu1~20.04.5').
python3.9 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.9.5-3ubuntu0~20.04.1+esm1').
